channel.title: Romie Lee's "The Broadcast"
channel.description: Its sometimes angry, its sometimes too real but its never not funny...Get your steady dose of fuckery at The Broadcast.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Talking Shop on bitches, on the reg.
channel.itunes:author: Romie Lee
channel.itunes:summary: Its sometimes angry, its sometimes too real but its never not funny...Get your steady dose of fuckery at The Broadcast.

item.title: Season Two Episode Five
item.description: You know the deal by now, Romie and Kency back in the Broadcast studio putting fools on blast.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: You know the deal by now, Romie and Kency back in the Broadcast studio putting fools on blast.

item.title: Season Two Episode Four
item.description: Season Two of the Broadcast is in full swing with what else? A trio of broads making their way into The Broadcast Studio with Romie and Mikey. "Winter", "Jasmine" and "Mrs Mikey" current and former dancers give insight and some good stories about Gentlemens Club patrons and in true Broadcast fashion punches were not pulled.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: Season Two of the Broadcast is in full swing with what else? A trio of broads making their way into The Broadcast Studio with Romie and Mikey. "Winter", "Jasmine" and "Mrs Mikey" current and former dancers give insight and some good stories about Gentlemens Club patrons and in true Broadcast fashion punches were not pulled.

item.title: The Broadcast : Season Two Episode Three
item.description: Mikey Bentley back in the Broadcast Studio as well as our boy Knee-Grow talking mad shit and Jimi Bishop gives us an over the phone account of his The Price is Right experience.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: Mikey Bentley back in the Broadcast Studio as well as our boy Knee-Grow talking mad shit and Jimi Bishop gives us an over the phone account of his The Price is Right experience.

item.title: The Broadcast : Season Two Episode Two
item.description: Season two is in full swing and by that we mean Romie is angry again at among other things everything hear his "Open Letter To A Stripper" bit thats never quite made it to the stage and his hatred for cell phone using douchefags.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: Season two is in full swing and by that we mean Romie is angry again at among other things everything hear his "Open Letter To A Stripper" bit thats never quite made it to the stage and his hatred for cell phone using douchefags.

item.title: The Broadcast : Season Two Episode One
item.description: Kency and Romie fire up the broadcast studio for the kick off of season two, bantering, bullshitting and putting dickholes on blast.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: Kency and Romie fire up the broadcast studio for the kick off of season two, bantering, bullshitting and putting dickholes on blast.

item.title: The Broadcast: Episode Seventeen
item.description: Its a miracle, the shortest podcast we've done since having guest hosts, too bad it 45 minutes Romie giving a big fuck you to some douhebag that called him a "hack" comedian. Included is Romies first song "Harry Scott Shimp can suck my balls". Kencys along for the ride once again.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: Its a miracle, the shortest podcast we've done since having guest hosts, too bad it 45 minutes Romie giving a big fuck you to some douhebag that called him a "hack" comedian. Included is Romies first song "Harry Scott Shimp can suck my balls". Kencys along for the ride once again.

item.title: Episode Sixteen
item.description: The Broadcast rolls on like a fat bitch tripping down a hill. Romes and Mikey are back in studio fired up about among other things, The Government, The Debt Ceiling, White Supremacist Black Metal and The raping of seemingly everybody by the beloved bottle-nosed dolphins.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: The Broadcast rolls on like a fat bitch tripping down a hill. Romes and Mikey are back in studio fired up about among other things, The Government, The Debt Ceiling, White Supremacist Black Metal and The raping of seemingly everybody by the beloved bottle-nosed dolphins.

item.title: Episode Fifteen
item.description: The Broadcast is back after an over month long hiatus, Romie is fired up and hating on EVERYTHING while Kency patiently sits and observes the meltdown, and theres some funny shit along the way too as Romes recounts his trip to the friendliest place on earth.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
item.itunes:summary: The Broadcast is back after an over month long hiatus, Romie is fired up and hating on EVERYTHING while Kency patiently sits and observes the meltdown, and theres some funny shit along the way too as Romes recounts his trip to the friendliest place on earth.

item.title: The Broadcast: Episode Thirteen
item.description: One last fresh episode of The Broadcast before going on hiatus for a while. Kency and Romie throwdown in The Broadcast Studio on the usual subjects and suspects, and Romie gets dark, well darker than usual but not to worry, that fat son of a bitch is all good in the hood.
item.dc:creator: Romie Lee
